greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of (n/tau(n) + sigma(n)/n).
link: Jaroslav Krizek, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: For n = 9; a(9) = numerator(9/tau(9) + sigma(9)/9) = numerator(9/3 + 13/9) = numerator(40/9) = 40.
program: (PARI) for(n=1, 100, s=n/numdiv(n); t=sigma(n)/n; print1(numerator(s+t),", ")) \\ _Derek Orr_, Aug 15 2014
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Aug 15 2014
